2025-08-05.quote: Taurus says: Today, act like you own the place—even if you don’t.

signRoasts.Aries: Aries, chill out, not everything is a competition.
signRoasts.Taurus: Taurus will ignore this advice but expect you to follow it.
signRoasts.Gemini: Gemini, make up your mind once in a while.
signRoasts.Cancer: Cancer, stop crying, the world’s not that bad.
signRoasts.Leo: Leo, the spotlight isn’t always on you, deal with it.
signRoasts.Libra: Libra, decide already. Indecision is not cute.
signRoasts.Scorpio: Scorpio, trust issues much? Chill for a day.
signRoasts.Sagittarius: Sagittarius, not every adventure needs to be your story.
signRoasts.Capricorn: Capricorn, work hard, but don’t forget to live.
signRoasts.Aquarius: Aquarius, weird is your brand, own it.

signRoasts.Gemini: Gemini, double minds create double problems.
signRoasts.Leo: Leo, not every roar demands attention.
signRoasts.Virgo: Virgo, learn to forgive your own mistakes.
signRoasts.Libra: Libra, balance is nice, but so is decisiveness.
signRoasts.Scorpio: Scorpio, your intensity scares people sometimes.
signRoasts.Capricorn: Capricorn, ambition without rest is burnout.
signRoasts.Aquarius: Aquarius, sometimes be the follower, not the leader.
